data.name: A Winter Story -- Original Edition and Highly Difficult
data.detailed_description:
KEYWORD: a local and serious fiction world, homesickness, attachment, memory, chatter

A perfect life is inseparable from health, love and family. A journey can enrich our insights and knowledges, but when we reach the destination, can we still see the sunshine as we did when we started?

🗓️ Where can I find you?


When winter comes, a young male sentry from the countryside lives a passive and confused days, but he still hopes to live a perfect and happy life.

In this game, everything needs your own exploration. You can't use those popular simplified ideas! You need to think about where you can go, to touch and serve the characters in the story, to deliberate mazes, enemies and principles, and finally find the important person back!

This is a work with a fantastic background. Your enemy has only four types of attacks(ordinary attack, brave attack, outstanding attack, powerful attack). You have your own family members, friends, strangers and may meet wild monsters. Your role is called Holder, who is easily depressed but accommodating. You will stride over a winter to spring. You can use the controller, keyboard or mouse to complete the battle in the game. If you want to win the game, you need to master appropriate level up, strategic action and battles.

🏰 Features


Participate in a winter of fighting, adventure and missing——

  • Succinct, approved, highly difficult first person turn-based battle
  • Highly sculptural imaginary characters and relationships
  • Deeply experience the life time and sorrow in the two countries
  • Explore freely in a lively, warm and possibly fighting world
  • A comedy ending that touching millions of people
  • ... and more!

🎮 Gameplay


Engage in dialogue, strategy and combat——

  • Move in the map, talk to the characters in the game, understand the situation and find the destination
  • Deliberate mazes, enemies and principles, trigger appropriate switches to open the door
  • Complete the task requested by the character in the game

You need level up in match for not to be easily defeated in the next maze. You can gain experience and promote your level by fighting with the enemy, and may gain new skills, and excessive slaughter does not mean better results.

You can't be defeated by the enemy in battle, otherwise the game will end.

data.short_description: Don't ask. Run, talk and strike down.
data.reviews:
“excellent”
𝐑𝐄𝐓𝐑𝐎

“Pleasant indie adventure reminiscent of a jrpg. The game has a nice,simple soundtrack.The game will appeal to fans of exploring worlds and plunging into the local atmosphere by participating in dialog”
Sorry for my bad english

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
